Texts.Eng: A scratching post? Looks I can use this as a waypoint for teleportation.
A small locator module attached to this scratching post allows it to be bookmarked for teleportation.
Cats find the waving flag to be a little TOO enticing, so they tend to use scratching posts as markers instead.
I can bookmark this scratching post for quick teleportin'.
Ssscratching posst makess good point to teleport back to ussing teleporter!
This scratching post can act as a way point, enabling me to return to this point using a teleporter.
This scratching post can be saved as a location for my teleporter. Then I can return to it at any time.
This scratching post can serve as a place to sharpen nails, and it allows mew to bookmark it for teleportation!
This scratching post must mean there are cats about. Looks like it can be bookmarked as a destination for my ship teleporter.
